title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. II, pt. 51 - Public Contacts Of Institutions And Employees
content:

§ 51.1 - Divulgence of information
§ 51.2 - Requests to photograph institutions
§ 51.3 - Taking nonemployees to institution departments
§ 51.4 - Control of visitors by employee
§ 51.5 - Restrictions on visitors
§ 51.6 - Employees not to accept tips
§ 51.7 - Entertainment fees prohibited
§ 51.8 - Superintendent may accept gifts and donations
§ 51.9 - Fingerprinting employees
§ 51.10 - Congregating at entrance prohibited
§ 51.11 - Department guidelines and policy for release of information to news media
§ 51.12 - Information sources
§ 51.13 - Inquiries
§ 51.14 - Release of inmate data
§ 51.15 - Media interviews
§ 51.16 - Use of names and photographs
§ 51.17 - Recording of interviews
§ 51.18 - Repealed
§ 51.19 - Repealed
§ 51.20 - Emergency situations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. II, pt. 51

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
